content: Once you revoke the consent to use the {{organizationName}} {{productName}} auth data in the services, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} will automatically stop logging. Your accounts will not be deleted.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the description displayed when revoking consent to use {{organizationName}} {{productName}} auth data. It informs users that their accounts will not be deleted after revocation and explains what happens next. This appears in a dialog related to revoking OAuth permissions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'تفويض' (tafweedh) for 'auth data' is not the most accurate or common translation in this context. A more suitable term might be 'بيانات الوصول' (bayanat al-wusool) or 'بيانات المصادقة' (bayanat al-musadaqa).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: بمجرد إلغاء الموافقة لاستخدام بيانات الوصول/المصادقة {{organizationName}}  {{productName}} في الخدمات، سيتوقف {{organizationName}} {{productName}} تلقائيًا عن التسجيل. لن يتم حذف حساباتك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of variable placeholders '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}' appears consistently in both English and Arabic. While technically correct, ensuring consistent formatting and potential for future localization adjustments within the Arabic translation is important. It would be ideal if the placeholder style matched other internal documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain consistent placeholder format based on internal documentation standards.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'stop logging' is translated as 'girişi dayandıracaq', which literally means 'will stop entry'. A more accurate translation for 'logging' in this context would be 'qeydiyyatı dayandıracaq' or 'ölçümleri dayandıracaq'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xidmətlərdə {{organizationName}} {{productName}} autentifikasiya məlumatından istifadə icazəsini ləğv etdikdə, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} avtomatik olaraq qeydiyyatı dayandıracaq. Hesablarınız silinməyəcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'profiles' (профили) is a less accurate translation of 'accounts' (accounts) in this context. While not entirely wrong, 'accounts' is more precise and conveys the intended meaning of user accounts accessing services.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вашите акаунти няма да бъдат изтрити.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'přihlašovat' (in 'automaticky přestane přihlašovat') doesn't accurately convey 'logging' in the context of data usage. It translates more literally to 'log in' or 'register'. A better translation would be 'zaznamenávat'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po odvolání souhlasu s použitím {{organizationName}} {{productName}} autorizačních údajů ve službách, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} automaticky přestane zaznamenávat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Anmeldung' (login) is used instead of 'Protokollierung' (logging). The English text specifically refers to logging, not login.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sobald Sie die Zustimmung zur Nutzung der Auth-Daten von {{organizationName}} {{productName}} in den Diensten widerrufen, wird {{organizationName}} {{productName}} automatisch die Protokollierung stoppen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'auth data' is translated as 'δεδομένων εξουσιοδότησης'. While technically correct, a more natural translation for 'auth data' in this context would be 'δεδομένων σύνδεσης' or 'δεδομένων εξουσιοδότησης πρόσβασης'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μόλις ανακαλέσετε τη συγκατάθεση για τη χρήση των δεδομένων σύνδεσης του {{productName}} της {{organizationName}} στις υπηρεσίες...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of '{{productName}} της {{organizationName}}' makes the sentence clunky. It might be better to rephrase to avoid the repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μόλις ανακαλέσετε τη συγκατάθεση για τη χρήση των δεδομένων εξουσιοδότησης του {{productName}} της {{organizationName}} στις υπηρεσίες, το {{productName}} θα σταματήσει αυτόματα την καταγραφή...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'dejará de iniciar sesión automáticamente' is an inaccurate translation of 'automatically stop logging'. 'Iniciar sesión' means 'to log in', while the English refers to the process of data logging. A more accurate translation would reflect the data logging process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Una vez revocado el consentimiento para utilizar los datos de autenticación de {{organizationName}} {{productName}} en los servicios, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} dejará de registrar los datos automáticamente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation "lopettaa automaattisesti" is not the most natural way to express 'automatically stop logging'. A better phrasing would emphasize the stopping of logging.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos peruutat suostumuksen käyttää {{organizationName}} {{productName}} todennustietoja palveluissa, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} lopettaa automaattisesti lokien keräämisen. (This translates to: If you revoke the consent to use {{organizationName}} {{productName}} authentication data in the services, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} will automatically stop collecting logs.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Tilejäsi' is grammatically correct, but 'accounts' is generally translated to 'tilit' in this context, especially in a technical setting. 'Tilejäsi' is more informal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos peruutat suostumuksen käyttää {{organizationName}} {{productName}} todennustietoja palveluissa, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} lopettaa automaattisesti lokien keräämisen. Tilejäsi ei poisteta. (Keep 'Tilejäsi' if the intended tone is informal; otherwise, use 'Tilisi ei poisteta.')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'logging' is translated as 'se connecter' (to connect). 'Logging' in this context refers to data recording, not connection establishment. A more appropriate translation would be 'enregistrer des données'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'se connecter' with 'enregistrer des données'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes unnecessary repetition of '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}' multiple times. It reads awkwardly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition. For example: 'Երբ չեղարկեք ծառայություններում {{organizationName}} {{productName}} վավերացման տվյալները օգտագործելու համաձայնությունը, {{organizationName}} կդադարեցնի գրանցումը: Ձեր հաշիվները չեն ջնջվի:' (This suggestion removes the redundant name after 'կդադարեցնի'). More context might be needed to make a perfectly natural-sounding alteration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'auth data' is not accurately translated. 'auth data' refers to authorization data, and a more appropriate translation would be 'dati di autorizzazione'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Una volta revocato il consenso all'uso dei dati di autorizzazione {{organizationName}} {{productName}} nei servizi...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'stop logging' is translated as 'smetterà automaticamente di registrare'. A more natural and accurate translation would be 'cesserà automaticamente di raccogliere dati'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Una volta revocato il consenso all'uso dei dati di autorizzazione {{organizationName}} {{productName}} nei servizi, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} cesserà automaticamente di raccogliere dati.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "로그인하는 것을 중단합니다" (log in) doesn't directly correspond to "logging" in the English content. The English describes stopping the recording of data, not the ability to log in.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 서비스에서 {{organizationName}} {{productName}} 인증 데이터를 사용하는 기능에 대한 동의 철회 시, {{organizationName}} {{productName}}에서 자동으로 데이터 로깅을 중단합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a slightly different sentence structure compared to the English. Maintaining consistency in sentence flow would enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 서비스에서 {{organizationName}} {{productName}} 인증 데이터 사용에 대한 동의를 철회하면, {{organizationName}} {{productName}}에서 자동으로 데이터 로깅을 중단하며, 계정은 삭제되지 않습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຮັບຜົນຮັບການອະນຸຍາດ" (rob phon rob kan anuyat) is an awkward and potentially incorrect translation of "consent to use". A more natural translation would focus on giving permission or agreeing to use.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເມື່ອທ່ານຍົກເລີກການອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ໃຊ້ຂໍ້ມູນຂອງ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ຢູ່​ໃນ​ບໍ​ລິ​ການ​ຕ່າງໆ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation maintains the English variable placeholders "{{organizationName}} {{productName}}". While not strictly an error, consider whether these placeholders will be correctly handled in the Lao context and if a more localized representation is appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ideally, determine if these variables need localization and replace if necessary. Otherwise, ensure the rendering system correctly handles them.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is awkward and could be improved for better readability. "Zodra u de toestemming voor het gebruik van de {{organizationName}} {{productName}} auth gegevens in de diensten" is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zodra u de toestemming intrekt voor het gebruik van {{organizationName}} {{productName}} auth gegevens in de diensten...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'automatisch stoppen met loggen' is grammatically correct but sounds less formal and could be improved for a more professional tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: stopt {{organizationName}} {{productName}} automatisch met het loggen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of '{{organizationName}} {{productName}}' feels redundant and could potentially be shortened if context allows.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider shortening to just '{{productName}}' or similar, depending on the overall context of the message.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "dla {{productName}} w usługach {{productName}} {{organizationName}}" is awkward and doesn't accurately reflect the English "to use the {{organizationName}} {{productName}} auth data in the services". The repetition of {{productName}} is also incorrect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po wycofaniu zgody na użycie danych autoryzacji {{organizationName}} {{productName}} w usługach, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} automatycznie przestanie się logować.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "w usługach" (in the services) is placed awkwardly after "danych autoryzacji". It feels disjointed from the rest of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po wycofaniu zgody na użycie danych autoryzacji {{organizationName}} {{productName}} w usługach, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} automatycznie przestanie się logować.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "dados de autenticação da {{organizationName}} {{productName}} dados de autenticação" is redundant. It repeats "dados de autenticação".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Depois que você revogar o consentimento para usar os dados de autenticação da {{organizationName}} {{productName}} nos serviços, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} interromperá automaticamente o registro. Suas contas não serão excluídas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Depois que você revogar...' could be slightly improved for flow. While grammatically correct, it can feel a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Assim que você revogar o consentimento para usar os dados de autenticação da {{organizationName}} {{productName}} nos serviços, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} interromperá automaticamente o registro. Suas contas não serão excluídas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de serviciul" is awkward and doesn't accurately translate "in the services." It implies that the data is being used *by* the service, not *in* the services.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odată ce ați revocat consimțământul pentru utilizarea datelor de autentificare {{organizationName}} {{productName}} în serviciile, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} va opri automat autentificarea. Conturile dvs nu vor fi șterse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “autentificarea” is a direct translation of authentication and feels unnatural in this context. 'logging' is more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odată ce ați revocat consimțământul pentru utilizarea datelor de autentificare {{organizationName}} {{productName}} în serviciile, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} va opri automat înregistrarea. Conturile dvs nu vor fi șterse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'înregistrarea' is often used for registration. 'înregistrare' feels more aligned with 'logging'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odată ce ați revocat consimțământul pentru utilizarea datelor de autentificare {{organizationName}} {{productName}} în serviciile, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} va opri automat înregistrarea. Conturile dvs nu vor fi șterse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'revoke' is awkwardly translated as 'අ අව revoke'. The standard way to express 'revoke' in this context would be closer to 'ඉවත් කිරීම'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සේවා වල {{organizationName}} {{productName}} බලපත්‍ර දත්ත භාවිත කිරීමට ඔබ කැමැත්ත ඉවත් කිරීම් කළ පසු

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ඉවත් කිරීම් කළ පසු' sounds a bit clunky. A more natural flow would be 'ඉවත් කළ පසු'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සේවා වල {{organizationName}} {{productName}} බලපත්‍ර දත්ත භාවිත කිරීමට ඔබ කැමැත්ත ඉවත් කළ පසු

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation of "logging" is inaccurate. "Prihlasovať" means "to log in" (a user action), not "to log data". The intended meaning is data logging, recording, or tracking.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po odvolaní súhlasu na používanie {{organizationName}} {{productName}} autorizačných údajov, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} sa automaticky prestane zaznamenávať. / Po odvolaní súhlasu na používanie {{organizationName}} {{productName}} autorizačných údajov, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} sa automaticky prestane ukladať.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'auth data' is not directly translated. 'Avtorizaciji' is a good attempt, but 'avtorizacijskih podatkov' would be more precise for 'auth data'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ko prekličete soglasje za uporabo avtorizacijskih podatkov {{organizationName}} {{productName}} v storitvah...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistency in spacing around the variables {{organizationName}} {{productName}}. The English version has a space before and after the variable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ko prekličete soglasje za uporabo avtorizacijskih podatkov {{organizationName}} {{productName}} v storitvah...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'пријављује' (prijava) in the Serbian translation implies 'logging in' or 'checking in', not 'logging data'. A more accurate translation for 'logging' in this context would be 'бележи' (beleži).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Када опозовете пристанак за коришћење {{organizationName}} {{productName}} података за ауторизацију у услугама, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} ће аутоматски престати да бележи. Ваши налози неће бити обрисани.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term "logging" is translated as "prijavljuje". While "prijavljuje" can mean "logging in", in the context of data collection and tracking, a more accurate translation would be "evidentira" or "beleži". "Prijavljuje" implies a user action, which is not the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kada opozovete pristanak za korišćenje {{organizationName}} {{productName}} podataka za autorizaciju u uslugama, {{organizationName}} {{productName}} će automatski prestati da se evidentira/beleži.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'automatically stop logging' is translated as 'припинить автоматичний вхід' which means 'will automatically log in'. This is the opposite of the intended meaning. It should convey the cessation of data logging.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Після того як ви відкликаєте згоду на використання даних аутентифікації {{productName}} {{organizationName}} в службах, {{productName}} {{organizationName}} припинить автоматичний збір даних.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation maintains the English formatting of `{{productName}} {{organizationName}}`. While technically correct, it may be more natural to rephrase this within the Vietnamese sentence structure for better readability. Consider restructuring for smoother flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the occurrences of '{{productName}} {{organizationName}}' to integrate more naturally into the sentence, possibly using a more descriptive phrase or restructuring the sentence order.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'logging' is translated as '登录' (dēnglù), which means 'login' in Chinese. The English 'logging' refers to data logging, a different concept. It should be translated to reflect data logging.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 在您撤销在服务中使用{{organizationName}} {{productName}}身份验证数据的同意后，{{organizationName}} {{productName}}将自动停止数据记录。 (在您撤销在服务中使用{{organizationName}} {{productName}}身份验证数据的同意后，{{organizationName}} {{productName}}将自动停止数据收集。)
